pages.text: Tanzilu Al-Kitabi Mina Allahi Al-`Azizi Al-Hakimi
Inna Fi As-Samawati Wa Al-'Ari La'ayatin Lilmu'uminina
Wa Fi Khalqikum Wa Ma Yabuththu Min Dabbatin 'Ayatun Liqawmin Yuqinuna
Wa Akhtilafi Al-Layli Wa An-Nahari Wa Ma 'Anzala Allahu Mina As-Sama'i Min Rizqin Fa'ahya Bihi Al-'Ara Ba`da Mawtiha Wa Tasrifi Ar-Riyahi 'Ayatun Liqawmin Ya`qiluna
Tilka 'Ayatu Allahi Natluha `Alayka Bil-Haqqi Fabi'ayyi Hadithin Ba`da Allahi Wa 'Ayatihi Yu'uminuna
Yasma`u 'Ayati Allahi Tutla `Alayhi Thumma Yusirru Mustakbiraan Ka'an Lam Yasma`ha Fabashirhu Bi`adhabin 'Alimin
Wa 'Idha `Alima Min 'Ayatina Shay'aan Attakhadhaha Huzuan 'Ula'ika Lahum `Adhabun Muhinun
Min Wara'ihim Jahannamu Wa La Yughni `Anhum Ma Kasabu Shay'aan Wa La Ma Attakhadhu Min Duni Allahi 'Awliya'a Wa Lahum `Adhabun `Azimun
Hadha Hudaan Wa Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bi'ayati Rabbihim Lahum `Adhabun Min Rijzin 'Alimun
Allahu Al-Ladhi Sakhkhara Lakumu Al-Bahra Litajriya Al-Fulku Fihi Bi'amrihi Wa Litabtaghu Min Falihi Wa La`allakum Tashkuruna
Wa Sakhkhara Lakum Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'Ari Jami`aan Minhu 'Inna Fi Dhalika La'ayatin Liqawmin Yatafakkaruna
